column4: Question: I messed up my window manager. How can I boot into gdm so I can select and start gnome again?
u could log into the failsafe gnome
thanks adalal. how do I do that?
guys, i need help to reverse print on cups...
on the login screen, there's an option
I don't have a login screen.. How do I start it from the command line?
no.. startx drops me into gnome, but they keyboard and mouse don't work anymore..
I'm trying xfix now, to see if that does anything

Question for anyone who is able to help: I am having trouble starting gnome. I installed dwm but am not ready for it. How do I revert back to gnome from the command line? I don't have a .xinitrc in my home dir. What I need to know is which file runs the command to start dwm, so I can revert it back to gnome
xfix didn't really do anything - it still goes into dwm unfortunately
